snippet: The United Arab Emirates has a longstanding relationship with the Center for Strategic and International Studies through which it sponsors a series of talks at the center about issues related to the Persian Gulf, papers about the region and trips...
lead_paragraph: The United Arab Emirates has a longstanding relationship with the Center for Strategic and International Studies through which it sponsors a series of talks at the center about issues related to the Persian Gulf, papers about the region and trips that C.S.I.S. organizes that involve American security experts, to learn more about the region.

headline.main: U.A.E. and C.S.I.S.: A Mutually Beneficial Relationship
